subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Darrelle Revis, traded by the Jets in April, knows that the Buccaneers are taking a chance that he can recover fully from a torn knee ligament. “But I’m betting on myself. Wouldn’t you?” Revis said.
snippet: Darrelle Revis, traded by the Jets in April, knows that the Buccaneers are taking a chance that he can recover fully from a torn knee ligament. “But I’m betting on myself. Wouldn’t you?” Revis said.
